EmailTemplate.description: Use for PRO more info required from internal user
EmailTemplate.name: PRO Info Required (INTERNAL ONLY)
EmailTemplate.subject: PRO Information Needed; {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Notification #: <insert notification #> Part Number: <insert part #> Serial Number: <insert serial #> Purchase Order #: <insert PO #>
To process this PRO request please provide:
PO copy Ship to code Quantity contract number.
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
